data.eml:eml: An appraisal of Typilobus Stoliczka, 1871 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Leucosioidea), with description of a new family and genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Artal, Pedro, Hyžný, Matúš (2016): An appraisal of Typilobus Stoliczka, 1871 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Leucosioidea), with description of a new family and genus. Zootaxa 4117 (3): 387-398, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.3.6
